verbose_text: In the first series of experiments crossing the Tbx6 mutant stock with mice carrying the Gdf1 transgene, all wild-type embryos at E8.5 showed expression of Pitx2 in the left IFT of the heart (n = 13), whereas the majority of Tbx6 homozygous mutants had no detectable Pitx2 expression in the IFT (n = 26/27).
